name: Mario's Cement Factory
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.5 (alpha) Details Title Mario's Cement Factory Model No. CM-72 Series Game & Watch (Table Top) Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date April 28, 1983 Chipset Sharp SM511 ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

In this Tabletop edition of Nintendo's Game & Watch series Mario finds himself working in a cement factory where he must load concrete into waiting trucks by operating a series of concrete mixers.

Gameplay

In the cement factory there are two concrete mixers on either side feeding concrete into hoppers. The hoppers are located on two levels. Three loads of concrete from the mixer will fill a hopper. Any more, and the concrete spills over on to the truck driver. Mario will have to open the valves on the hoppers to the release the concrete before the hopper fills up. To reach the hoppers Mario will have to hop on and off platforms moving between the levels while being careful not to fall off.
